metadata.description: UGA campus locations with addresses for generating Google Maps / Apple Maps walking direction links

Brandon Oaks.address: Brandon Oaks, 710 East Campus Rd, Athens, GA 30602

Rogers Road.address: Rogers Road Housing UGA, Athens, GA 30602

Bolton Dining Commons.address: Bolton Dining Commons, 50 Carlton Street, Athens, GA 30602
Bolton Dining Commons.description: Main dining hall on north campus. All-you-can-eat buffet style.

Snelling Dining Commons.address: Snelling Dining Commons, 255 East Green Street, Athens, GA 30602
Snelling Dining Commons.description: Central campus dining near Brumby and Reed.

Oglethorpe Dining Commons.address: Oglethorpe Dining Commons, Oglethorpe House, Athens, GA 30602

Village Summit Dining.address: Village Summit Dining, 800 East Campus Road, Athens, GA 30602
Village Summit Dining.description: Dining hall serving East Campus Village area.

The Niche.address: The Niche, Snelling Dining Commons, Athens, GA 30602
The Niche.description: Food court-style dining in the lower level of Snelling.

Tate Student Center.address: Tate Student Center, 45 Baxter Street, Athens, GA 30602
Tate Student Center.description: Main student center with Chick-fil-A, Panda Express, Starbucks, game room, UGA Bookstore, and meeting rooms.

Miller Learning Center (MLC).address: Miller Learning Center, 271 South Jackson Street, Athens, GA 30602
Miller Learning Center (MLC).description: Major study building. Open 24/7 during semester. 4 floors of study space, group rooms, Jittery Joe's coffee.

Main Library.address: Main Library UGA, 320 South Jackson Street, Athens, GA 30602
Main Library.description: Ilah Dunlap Little Memorial Library. Quiet study, research collections, media center.

Science Library.address: Science Library UGA, 240 D.W. Brooks Drive, Athens, GA 30602
Science Library.description: STEM-focused library in the Science Learning Center on south campus.

Ramsey Student Center.address: Ramsey Student Center, 330 River Road, Athens, GA 30602
Ramsey Student Center.description: Main gym. Pool, basketball, weights, cardio, indoor track, climbing wall, group fitness. Free with student ID.

University Health Center.address: University Health Center, 55 Carlton Street, Athens, GA 30602
University Health Center.description: Student health clinic. Primary care, immunizations, counseling, pharmacy. Free/low-cost for students.

Sanford Stadium.address: Sanford Stadium, 100 Sanford Drive, Athens, GA 30602
Sanford Stadium.description: Home of UGA Bulldogs football. 92,746 seats. 'Between the Hedges.'

Stegeman Coliseum.address: Stegeman Coliseum, 100 Smith Street, Athens, GA 30602
Stegeman Coliseum.description: UGA basketball and gymnastics venue on east campus.

The Arch.address: The Arch UGA, Broad Street at College Avenue, Athens, GA 30601
The Arch.description: Iconic UGA entrance. Tradition: don't walk through until graduation.

UGA Bookstore.address: UGA Bookstore, Tate Student Center, 45 Baxter Street, Athens, GA 30602
UGA Bookstore.description: Textbooks, UGA merchandise, supplies, and tech. 1st floor of Tate.

North Campus Quad.address: North Campus, University of Georgia, Athens, GA 30602
North Campus Quad.description: Historic green space with oaks, Old College, the Chapel, Demosthenian Hall.

Park Hall.address: Park Hall UGA, 325 South Jackson Street, Athens, GA 30602
Park Hall.description: Major classroom building. English, Philosophy, humanities departments.

Aderhold Hall.address: Aderhold Hall, 110 Carlton Street, Athens, GA 30602
Aderhold Hall.description: College of Education. Large lecture halls.

Terry College of Business.address: Terry College of Business, 600 South Lumpkin Street, Athens, GA 30602
Terry College of Business.description: College of Business — Amos Hall, Brooks Hall, Correll Hall complex.

Chemistry Building.address: Chemistry Building UGA, 140 Cedar Street, Athens, GA 30602
Chemistry Building.description: Main chemistry lecture and lab building on south campus.

Pharmacy Building.address: College of Pharmacy UGA, 250 West Green Street, Athens, GA 30602
Pharmacy Building.description: College of Pharmacy, R.C. Wilson Pharmacy Building.

Grady College of Journalism.address: Grady College of Journalism, 120 Hooper Street, Athens, GA 30602
Grady College of Journalism.description: Journalism and Mass Communication on North Campus.

Boyd GSRC.address: Boyd Graduate Studies Research Center, 200 D.W. Brooks Drive, Athens, GA 30602
Boyd GSRC.description: Boyd Graduate Studies Research Center on south campus.

Student Learning Center (SLC).address: Student Learning Center UGA, 101 Cedar Street, Athens, GA 30602
Student Learning Center (SLC).description: Large classroom building on south campus. Many intro-level science courses.

Engineering Complex.address: College of Engineering UGA, 597 D.W. Brooks Drive, Athens, GA 30602
Engineering Complex.description: College of Engineering — Driftmier and Rhodes buildings.

Coverdell Center.address: Paul D. Coverdell Center, 500 D.W. Brooks Drive, Athens, GA 30602
Coverdell Center.description: Paul D. Coverdell Center for Biomedical and Health Sciences.

Founders Memorial Garden.address: Founders Memorial Garden, 325 South Lumpkin Street, Athens, GA 30602
Founders Memorial Garden.description: Beautiful garden honoring the Ladies Garden Club of Athens.

Five Points.address: Five Points, Lumpkin Street and Milledge Avenue, Athens, GA 30606
Five Points.description: Popular shopping and dining intersection. Restaurants, coffee shops, stores.

Downtown Athens.address: Downtown Athens, Broad Street, Athens, GA 30601
Downtown Athens.description: Restaurants, bars, live music, shops on Broad Street. Very walkable from North Campus.

Performing Arts Center.address: UGA Performing Arts Center, 230 River Road, Athens, GA 30602
Performing Arts Center.description: Hodgson Concert Hall and Ramsey Concert Hall. Major performances.

Georgia Museum of Art.address: Georgia Museum of Art, 90 Carlton Street, Athens, GA 30602
Georgia Museum of Art.description: Official state art museum. Free admission. Near the Performing Arts Center.

Memorial Hall.address: Memorial Hall UGA, 225 North Jackson Street, Athens, GA 30602
Memorial Hall.description: Historic building with student org offices and event spaces.

Legion Pool.address: Legion Pool UGA, 390 Smith Street, Athens, GA 30602
Legion Pool.description: Outdoor pool, free for students with ID. Open during warm months.

Intramural Fields.address: UGA Intramural Fields, East Campus Road, Athens, GA 30602
Intramural Fields.description: Open fields for intramural sports between east campus dorms and Ramsey.

East Campus Deck.address: East Campus Parking Deck, East Campus Road, Athens, GA 30602
East Campus Deck.description: Main parking deck for east campus. Closest for Brumby, Reed, ECV, Oglethorpe.

Hull Street Deck.address: Hull Street Parking Deck, Athens, GA 30602
Hull Street Deck.description: Parking near Hill Community and Creswell.

Carlton Street Deck.address: Carlton Street Parking Deck, Athens, GA 30602
Carlton Street Deck.description: Parking on Carlton Street near Bolton and Health Center.

Tate Center Parking Deck.address: Tate Center Parking Deck, 65 Baxter Street, Athens, GA 30602
Tate Center Parking Deck.description: Parking adjacent to Tate Student Center.

UGA Police Department.address: UGA Police Department, 1120 Riverbend Parkway, Athens, GA 30602
UGA Police Department.description: Campus police HQ. Non-emergencies: (706) 542-2200. Call 911 for emergencies.

Lamar Dodd School of Art.address: Lamar Dodd School of Art, 270 River Road, Athens, GA 30602
Lamar Dodd School of Art.description: Art school with galleries and studios on east campus.

ugaBusInfo.description: UGA Campus Transit System — free bus service throughout campus.
ugaBusInfo.app: UGA Bus app or TransLoc Rider app for real-time tracking
ugaBusInfo.hours: Mon-Fri 7am-7pm during semester. Limited weekend service.
tips: All UGA buses are free with your UGA ID
Download the TransLoc app for real-time bus tracking
Most routes run every 10-15 minutes during peak hours
Buses don't run during breaks or university holidays

walkingAtNight: Use well-lit main paths — avoid shortcuts through dark areas
Walk with a friend when possible, especially after dark
Use the UGA Safe app to request a safety escort from UGA Police
Keep your phone charged and accessible
Share your location with a friend when walking at night
Call UGA Police for a free walking escort: (706) 542-2200
safetyTips.blueEmergencyPhones: Blue light emergency phones are throughout campus. Press the button to call UGA Police.
safetyTips.safeEscort: UGA Police offers free walking escorts 24/7. Call (706) 542-2200.
